params.data: Data to send to the contract.
params.to: Address of the contract to execute.
params.value: Value to send to the contract.

returns._0: success_ Boolean indicating if the execution was successful.
returns._1: result_ Bytes containing the result of the execution.

fundBankroll(address,uint256).details: Fund bankroll with ERC20 tokens directly (no fee)

getIsGame(address).details: function to get if game is allowed to access the bankroll

getIsValidWager(address,address).details: function to check if a token is valid for given game

params.tokenAddress: address of the wagered token to validate

getIsValidWagerWithReserve(address,addre.details: Check if wager is valid considering reserved funds

params.game: Game Address to check wager against reserve
params.maxPayout: Payout to check if enough reserved funds are in place for it
params.tokenAddress: ERC20 token to check wager reserves for

increaseSuspensionTime(uint256).details: Increse suspension time of a player by a certain amount of time. This function is intended to only be used as a complement to the suspend() function to increase suspension time.

params.suspensionTime: Time to increase suspension time for in seconds.

isPlayerSuspended(address).details: Function to view player suspension status.

returns._1: uint256 time that unlock period ends

liftSuspension().details: Lift suspension after the required amount of time has passed

permantlyBan().details: Permantly suspend player. This function sets suspension time to the maximum allowed time.

releaseFunds(address,uint256).details: Release reserved funds after game completes

reserveFunds(address,uint256).details: Reserve funds for a game (called by game contracts)

setGame(address,bool).details: Function to enable or disable games to distribute bankroll payouts

params.game: contract address of game to change state
params.isValid: state to set the address to

setTokenAddress(address,bool).details: function to set if a given token can be wagered

params.isValid: state to set the address to
params.tokenAddress: address of the token to set address

setWrappedAddress(address).details: function to set the wrapped token contract of the native asset

params.wrapped: address of the wrapped token contract

suspend(uint256).details: Suspend player by a certain amount time. This function can only be used if the player is not suspended since it could be used to lower suspension time.

params.suspensionTime: Time to be suspended for in seconds.

transferPayout(address,uint256,address).details: function that games call to transfer payout

params.player: address of the player to transfer payout to
params.tokenAddress: address of the token to transfer, 0 address is the native token

isActiveBankroll().notice: Check if this bankroll is the current active one
